price: Dijo [Moisés]: "¡Oh, Señor mío! Temo que me desmientan,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
